StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateCandidateProfessedExam]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ID uniqueiden..er ,@MarineCandidateID int ,@ProfessedExamType char(1) ,@ExamDate date.me ,@ExamEnteredDate date.me ,@ExamScore .oat ,@ExamScore2 int ,@ExamScore3 int ,@UserLogin varchar(15) ) AS
UPDATE [dbo].[CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM] SET [PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE] = @ProfessedExamType ,[EXAM_DATE] = @ExamDate ,[EXAM_ENTERED_DATE] = @ExamEnteredDate ,[EXAM_SCORE] = @ExamScore ,[EXAM_SCORE2] = @ExamScore2 ,[EXAM_SCORE3] = @ExamScore3 ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE rowguid = @ID
